name: The Red Shoes (dorothea0506127@gmail.com)
description: This is a 2D pixelated single player adventure game in which the player will take on the role of a little fox, who is obsessed with performing the best dance in the world, but only the legendary red shoes can help her achieve this dream. To achieve this goal, the player will need to use the keyboard to control the game and lead the little fox through the many levels of difficulty to find the legendary red dancing shoes.
